SEARCH
Package nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.renderer

Class Renderer

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.renderer.Renderer
public class Renderer extends Object
This is the main class on the Renderer Package. It is responsible for update the board display when it receives the appropriate events.

  • Constructor Details

    • Renderer

      public Renderer(Domain currentDomain, int canvasSize)
      Creates boardCanvas and scrollPane.
      Parameters:
      currentDomain - the current domain used by Game
      canvasSize - size of the game display

  • Method Details

    • centerViewportOnPlayer

      private void centerViewportOnPlayer(Position playerPosition)
      Responsible for calculating a value between 0.0 and 1.0 that represents the location the Player is, relative to the board. This value is used to center the scroll panel on the player.
      Parameters:
      playerPosition - The Player Object's current coordinate

    • renderPlayer

      private void renderPlayer(Position pos)
      Responsible for animating the player.
      Parameters:
      pos - The Player's current coordinate

    • createAnimation

      private javafx.animation.Timeline createAnimation(javafx.scene.image.ImageView currentImageView)
      Creates an animation for a give sprite sheet.
      Parameters:
      currentImageView - The sprite sheet being used
      Returns:
      Timeline

    • updateFrame

      private void updateFrame(javafx.scene.image.ImageView currentImageView)
      Updates which frame is visible on a given sprite sheet.
      Parameters:
      currentImageView - The current sprite sheet being used

    • renderActors

      private void renderActors(Domain domain)
      Responsible for animating the actors.

    • playSound

      public static void playSound(String fileName)
      allows any package to play a sound statically.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the sound being played

    • movePlayer

      public void movePlayer(Direction direction, int translationSpeed)
      Moves player in the direction given by app package.
      Parameters:
      direction - direction at which the player will move
      translationSpeed - speed at which the player will move, matching the game timeout
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if translationSpeed is less than 0

    • moveActors

      public void moveActors(int translationSpeed)
      Moves all actors at the same time to the next cell - according to the route in the Actor object class. Needs to be called before the actor position gets updated.
      Parameters:
      translationSpeed - speed at which the player will move, matching the game timeout
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if translationSpeed is less than 0

    • getDisplay

      public javafx.scene.control.ScrollPane getDisplay()
      gets the scrollPane which provides a focus area on all the root children.
      Returns:
      scrollPane
